"Did we... say something to put her guar: "Please forgive her. We've never met anyone from the outside, so I think that's what's preventing her from opening up."
"Hey, what do you think we should do? We can't just leave it at this, right?"
"We're worried too, so let's try looking."
"Right? If a fellow ARKS is missing, of course we're gonna worry and try to find them."
"Right. Let's just do as normal and carry out a search effort. There shouldn't be any problems with that."
"Yeah! Our mission! Even if Meri's against it, we were gonna search anyways."
"Sorry for all the fuss. Your help really is appreciated."
"The two brothers are still out searching, right? Do you know which direction they went?"
"If I recall, Tulli said he was going to try the research lab. Taivus said he was headed towards \"Lost Central\"."
"Understood. Alright, let's see if we can run into one of them."
"Thanks, Kukka! Alright, let's get going! Tell Meri that we'll be back before dinner, okay?"
